sections.title: Our Treasure: the Territory
sections.text:
Fimagri associates more than 60 agricultural companies that have productive sites along all Apulia’s northern plane, the “Tavoliere delle Puglie”; from the light terrains and full of minerals next to Lesina and Varano Lakes, to the fertile lands downline of the Daunian Mountains.

Our treasure really is this territory, which boasts uniques pedoclimatic conditions for vegetables plantations.

sections.title: Our Goals: Sustainability, Food Safety, Innovation
sections.text: All Fimagri associates are gathered by:
